<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clockwork Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1857)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 22 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This brass-coated, [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) (Hardness 12, HP 90, BT 45) has _+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shield spikes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=42)_ made of bronze gears.

<document level="2" id="action-1555" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

</row>

---

A _greater clockwork shield's_ (Hardness 17, HP 130, and BT 65) gears are _+3 greater striking shield spikes_.
name: Clockwork Shield (Greater)
